text: @realDonaldTrump "Not everyone agrees"? NOBODY agrees, you illiterate boob - your lack of timely action on COVID-19 PLUS your idiotic tariff PLUS your inability to soothe a nation hurting from racism & police brutality are guaranteed to put us in a depression unlike any since the 1930s. Congrats.
